name: bcockpit
description: Just your average rocket box. Needed to pilot the ship.

name: acockpit
description: Maybe ccardboard isn't the best material for space exploration... This cockpit comes with an extra equipment slot!

name: vcockpit
description: Made with high polymer materials and borderline fictional technology for another slot and maximum piloting cred.

name: bengineering
description: This ship segment handles tools and shields... Though cardboard isn't the strongest shield...

name: aengineering
description: This engineering bay has an extra equipment slot and is made of slightly less degradeable metal.

name: vengineering
description: This pinnacle of space armaments features a second additional equipment slot.

name: bsciencebay
description: The science bay is used to conduct research and resource processing. It cannot be used to figure out how a cardboard space ship can fly.

name: asciencebay
description: This upgraded science bay has an extra equipment slot and is sensibly made of sturdier materials.

name: vsciencebay
description: The vulkan science bay is such a pinnacle of technology that it's a wonder what could be researched with it.

name: bcargobay
description: The basic cargo bay provides additional storage for equipment. It is therefore fitting that it is actually just made out of a cardboard box.

name: acargobay
description: The advanced cargo bay includes additional storage and less risk of getting lost in the mail.

name: vcargobay
description: Quantum technology allows the vulkan cargo bay to be bigger on the inside. Well worth the shipping price (get it?).

name: bthrusters
description: These thrusters provide the minimum necessary thrust to get off a planet... Somehow.

name: athrusters
description: These thrusters provide more equipment capacity and are a little more plausible.

name: vthrusters
description: These thrusters are the pinnacle of space traversal technology.

name: radar
description: This upgrade improves spatial awareness.

name: obcomputer
description: This on board computer adds extra equipment capacity for the cockpit. It is also slightly annoying.

name: petpod
description: Want a pet to keep you company in space? Now you can! It even comes with a space hamster!

name: bhead
description: Bobbleheads can cheer anyone up. Plus they're stylish.

name: cchair
description: This chair is nice and cozy for those long flights.

name: cbed
description: A comfy bed provides better naps during long journeys.

name: hseat
description: With insulated temperature control systems the heated seat can make any chair a luxury chair.

name: pillow
description: Pillows are soft. They're light. You can even make a pile of them!

name: agoodbook
description: Nothing like a good piece of literature to pass the time.

name: pflames
description: These painted flames can be aplied to a ship to make it go faster. This is how science works.

name: somnitool
description: Every ship should have an omni tool to handle the mysteries of space.

name: snet
description: This upgrade to the standard omni tool features an energy net.

name: sdrill
description: This upgrade is the upgrade that will pierce the heavens.

name: svacuum
description: This upgrade to the omni-tool sucks... In a good way.

name: lasergun
description: This basic gun provides basic pew pew functionality to the ship.

name: alienlaser
description: This mysterious laser built with alien tech is a good deal more powerful than a basic laser.

name: particlebeam
description: This laser upgrade uses complex shoop whooping technology to generate a massive energy beam.

name: callibratedguns
description: This list of callibrating instructions by a famous soldier give the ship's guns that extra oomph.

name: repulsors
description: This repulsor field diverts energy to provide some protection from impact damage.

name: forcefield
description: This sophisticated forcefield provides an even greater level of protection.

name: rplating
description: This simple reinforcement to the ship's hull can protect it from minor damage and insurance woes.

name: suspensors
description: This upgrade relieves some of the ship's internal stress to make it more effective at sustaining damage without breaking.

name: refiningchamber
description: The refinement chamber upgrade provides the means to generate more complex materials that are needed to build more advanced equipment.

name: alchemylab
description: The alchemy lab upgrade provides the capability to convert base materials from one state to another.

name: researchcentre
description: This upgrade to the science bay adds to its upgrade capacity for more sciency goodness.

name: minifridge
description: This fridge employs revolutionary technology to be slightly smaller than a full fridge while still being functional.

name: aicecream
description: This specially designed substance is both delicious and nutricious!

name: mwatypewriter
description: This mysterious monkey writing on a typewriter is suspected to some day generate a great masterpiece. Until that day he's pretty fun to watch.

name: stasispod
description: Stasis pods employ highly complex cryogenic technology to freeze the user. Great for not getting bored on long trips.

name: equipmentshelf
description: This simple upgrade provides additional shelves to store more stuff.

name: quantumchest
description: This upgrade uses quantum technology to store many things in a tiny box.

name: bigpetpen
description: This storage space holds your very own big space pet. For when a space hamster just isn't enough.

name: picnicbasket
description: This delicious assortment of fine foods is neatly sorted in a pleasant little basket. Beware of moon bears attempting to steal it.

name: boosters
description: This upgrade harnesses the power of crystal to bring the ship's speeds to new heights. A must have for anyone attempting the Kessel Run.

name: erecycler
description: This upgrade refilters exhaust generated by the engine to preserve fuel. A great choice for the environmentally conscious.

name: econverter
description: This addition to the fuel consumption system allows for more efficient conversion of fuel sources into proper energy.

name: fpfilter
description: This filtering system siphons energy with remarkable efficiency to maximise fuel effectiveness.

name: qreactor
description: The quantum reactor channels energy at the atomic level to produce spectacular boosts in energy output.

name: oilchange
description: This upgrade is a simple question of sensible maintenance. It is nonetheless a good way to keep your ship's performance up to snuff.

name: coolhat
description: This hat is cool. People who wear this hat are probably cool too. If nothing else they'll feel cool.

name: oxygenmask
description: This mask directs oxygen into your helmet to keep you alive in the harch conditions of space.

name: ominousmask
description: This creepy mask seems like it came out of old mayan legend. It is said to give the wielder great power.

name: redshirt
description: This shirt is speculated to curse the wearer with a short life. It's not very comfortable either.

name: comfysweater
description: This sweater may not be especially protective but it sure is cozy.

name: hazmatsuit
description: This suit is specially designed to protect the wearer from the elements and harsh environmental hazards.

name: pomnitool
description: Every self respecting astronaut has a one such tool for collecting resources. It is a must have for any true adventurer.

name: sonicshovel
description: This omni tool upgrade optimises the shovelling process with innovative sonic shovelling technology... Whatever that means.

name: simplegun
description: This gun is simple. It can be used to shoot things. It goes pew. That is all.

name: blaster
description: This blaster is a bit cooler than a simple gun. It is also more powerful.

name: cricketgun
description: This comically tiny gun packs a riddiculous punch.
